block.p: Andrea Jean Headley, the daughter of Shauna and Robert B. Headley of Yorktown Heights, N.Y., was married yesterday to Rama Singh Rai, a son of Carmen Singh Rai of Queens Village, Queens, and the late Latchman S. Rai. The Rev. William D. Eggers, a Lutheran minister, officiated at the Hilton Rye Town, a hotel in Rye Brook, N.Y.
Mrs. Rai, 28, is an operations manager in the Manhattan office of the retail sales and service subsidiary of Canon. She graduated from Georgetown.

Andrea Jean Headley, the daughter of Shauna and Robert B. Headley of Yorktown Heights, N.Y., was married yesterday to Rama Singh Rai, a son of Carmen Singh Rai of Queens Village, Queens, and the late Latchman S. Rai. The Rev. William D. Eggers, a Lutheran minister, officiated at the Hilton Rye Town, a hotel in Rye Brook, N.Y.

Andrea Jean Headley, the daughter of Shauna and Robert B. Headley of Yorktown Heights, N.Y., was married yesterday to Rama Singh Rai, a son of Carmen Singh Rai of Queens Village, Queens, and the late Latchman S. Rai. The Rev. William D. Eggers, a Lutheran minister, officiated at the Hilton Rye Town, a hotel in Rye Brook, N.Y.
Mrs. Rai, 28, is an operations manager in the Manhattan office of the retail sales and service subsidiary of Canon. She graduated from Georgetown.
Her father is a vice president for technical services at Tiffany & Company in Manhattan.

Mr. Rai, 35, is a staff lawyer in Manhattan at the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development. He graduated from the State University at Albany and received his law degree from St. John's University in Jamaica, Queens.
His mother retired as an accountant at Scotti Graphics, a printing business in Manhattan. His father retired as a lawyer in private practice in Queens Village.
